vulnerability_findings.name: init-variables-with-default-value
vulnerability_findings.message: Uninitialized variables are assigned with the types default value. Explicitly initializing a variable with its default value costs unnecessary gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
StandardToken.totalSupply_ (StandardBurnableToken.sol#189) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (StandardBurnableToken.sol#306-308)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
BasicToken.decimals should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#96)
BasicToken.frozen should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#97)
BasicToken.name should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#94)
BasicToken.symbol should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#95)
StandardToken.decimals should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#192)
StandardToken.name should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#190)
StandardToken.symbol should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#191)
StandardToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (StandardBurnableToken.sol#189)
